metadata.title: CVE-2018-19757 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a NULL pointer dereference at functionsixel_helper_set_additional_message (status.c) in libsixel 1.8.2 that willcause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
